headline.main: RUSSIAN IMPERIALISM THE FOE, NAZIS STATE; Berlin's 'Enemy No. 1' Label Shifted From Bolshevism

lead_paragraph: BERLIN, Nov. 24 -- In her war against the Soviet Union Germany is fighting not only for the obliteration of bolshevism but to destroy the traditional Russian "imperialism" -- a significant change in the Reich's declared war-and-peace aims -- it was announced here tonight on the eve of the AntiComintern Conference.
abstract: German press says Russian imperialism is foe in campaign declaring Stalin to be ideological successor of Russian czars
